comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content: An ‘ordinary’ war wedding at Prestatyn. Private Edward Albion George (Geoff Charles’ brother-in-law) and his bride Gladys face an uncertain future. For service wives, married life was not always the fairytale they expected and they often faced a long period of separation after the wedding day as the bridegroom returned to the front line.

comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Pictures of Interest, and we'd love to have this added to the group! God love them for the courage they showed by simply "getting on with it" and trying to make the best of things in those times. What a very 'touching' picture.

comment.author: 61172569@N00
comment._content:
”No one can understand history unless he reads it –
Not from the pages of the books the government approves,
But from the eyes and ears and mouths of those who lived it.”

comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content: Very nicely put MLP, very nicely put.
